mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flight ( departure, destination, flight_type, seat_class, min_age, max_age, item_id ) VALUES ( #{departure}, #{destination}, #{flightType}, #{seatClass}, #{minAge}, #{maxAge}, #{itemId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE flight SET departure = IFNULL( #{departure}, departure ), destination = IFNULL( #{destination}, destination ), flight_type = IFNULL( #{flightType}, flight_type ), seat_class = IFNULL( #{seatClass}, seat_class ), min_age = IFNULL( #{minAge}, min_age ), max_age = IFNULL( #{maxAge}, max_age ) WHERE flight_id = #{flightId}
